member.name: M:CauldronModels.Program.Main(System.String,System.String,igLibrary.Core.IG_CORE_PLATFORM,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes and replaces existing meshes on any igz containing a igModelInfo. This will NOT work on actors for now.
member.param: Platform the game is on. Example: IG_CORE_PLATFORM_CAFE
The pak or iga archive you wish to open
The path to the model you want to replace inside the pak or iga
The path pointing to the new model to overwrite the existing model with
the amount of scale the model should have. Default is 10
This is hacky but 4 shorts sucks so... Option to turn it off is there though. I have an implementation it is just not perfect

members.member: format2. 02 03 == funky ssc. 02 05 = funky tangents/normals. 04 05 = half float uv's
format. 02 0E == funky ssc. 02 0B = funky tangents/normals. 08 08 = half float uv's
